inclusion.criterion: Patients with IPAH and SPAH (defined as a mean PAP >25 mm Hg at rest) not responding optimally to current medical therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: optimally to current medical therapy (defined as a reduction of <5mmHg in the resting mean PAP during medication, or unchanged 6-min walk test)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with structural heart diseases with left-to right shunting and/or with Eisenmenger syndrome
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 79 yo F with multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen admitted with complaints of worsening shortness of breath.
